about.en: Cook Largecap Index (CLI) includes five tokens that have the largest circulating market capitalizations. These large cap tokens represent the biggest and the best tokens in crypto and are the cornerstones of the entire industry.
about.cn: Crypto Largecap Index (CLI) 包括很多很厲害的token

objective.en: The Cook Largecap Index (CLI) is a digital asset index designed to track five of the largest tokens’ performance in the crypto industry. The index is weighted based on the value of each token’s circulating supply.

methodology.en: The Cook Protocol team has used the following criteria to select what tokens will be included in the Cook Largecap Index (CLI):

en: The tokens must be available on Ethereum mainnet
The token must not be considered a security by the corresponding authorities across different jurisdictions
The selected tokens must have sufficient liquidity across a variety of trading platforms
The tokens must be ranked as top 100 tokens with the largest market cap on Coingecko and CoinMarketCap consistently
The tokens must have gone through audits and must comply with security best practices
The circulating market capitalizations of each project are used to calculate index composition
circulating_supply is the number of tokens circulating in the market. CoinGecko is used as a reference source
market_price is the market price of the token in USD. CoinGecko is used as a reference source
index_divisor is a constant used to compute the nominal value of the index. The divisor is XXX at inception
index_price is the spot value of the index token

operation.en: The Cook Largecap Index (CLI) is a tokenized representation of the two largest projects in crypto.

rebalance.en: At the third week of the third month every quarter, the largecap index will be evaluated and tokens might be added and deleted from the index. As a result, the circulating supply of each component token will be recalculated based on the data from CoinGecko after updates on the index composition. The index components are adjusted, added, deleted or unchanged. New index weights, additions and deletions are incorporated into the index during the quarterly reconstitution, which will take place on the first business day of the month.
